original_text: The Lord God Almighty says this: ‘You people of Babylon are very proud, so I will fight against you. Now the day has come when I will punish you for your sins. The Lord God Almighty says this: ‘You people of Babylon are very proud, so I will fight against you. Now the day has come when I will punish you for your sins. The Lord God Almighty says this: ‘You people of Babylon are very proud, so I will fight against you. Now the day has come when I will punish you for your sins. The Lord God Almighty says this:
korean_text: 주 만군의 여호와의 말씀이니라 교만한 자여 보라 내가 너를 대적하나니 너의 날 곧 내가 너를 벌할 때가 이르렀음이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God Almighty says this:
You people of Babylon are very proud,
so I will fight against you.
Now the day has come
when I will punish you for your sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 죄 때문에 너희를 벌할 때이다.
